4336.verse: وَٱلَّذِى|And the One Who|137|153|6481$نَزَّلَ|sends down|98|130|1511$مِنَ|from|50|82|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|116|157$مَآءَۢ|water|58|90|202$بِقَدَرٍ|in (due) measure,|137|153|9741$فَأَنشَرْنَا|then We revive|121|132|15452$بِهِۦ|with it|62|84|204$بَلْدَةً|a land|60|82|12798$مَّيْتًا‌ۚ|dead,|57|79|5996$كَذَٲلِكَ|thus|77|99|702$تُخْرَجُونَ|you will be brought forth,|188|199|6332$

4337.verse: وَٱلَّذِى|And the One Who|137|148|6481$خَلَقَ|created|71|93|299$ٱلْأَزْوَٲجَ|the pairs|96|118|14487$كُلَّهَا|all of them|90|112|329$وَجَعَلَ|and made|84|106|5086$لَكُم|for you|67|89|207$مِّنَ|[of]|50|61|156$ٱلْفُلْكِ|the ships|80|135|6502$وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ|and the cattle|115|225|2679$مَا|what|53|163|262$تَرْكَبُونَ|you ride,|96|151|15453$

4340.verse: وَجَعَلُواْ|But they attribute|140|152|5896$لَهُۥ|to Him|62|86|977$مِنْ|from|50|74|53$عِبَادِهِۦ|His slaves|85|109|868$جُزْءًا‌ۚ|a portion.|84|108|15461$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|94|58$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|man|90|102|8037$لَكَفُورٌ مُّبِينٌ|surely (is) clearly ungrateful.|211|211|15462$

4341.verse: أَمِ|Or|38|46|9003$ٱتَّخَذَ|has He taken|107|123|11290$مِمَّا|of what,|76|92|216$يَخْلُقُ|He has created,|126|142|2875$بَنَاتٍ|daughters|86|102|15463$وَأَصْفَـٰكُم|and He has chosen (for) you|210|218|15464$بِٱلْبَنِينَ|sons.|83|83|10366$

4342.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|109|96$بُشِّرَ|is given good news,|151|199|9998$أَحَدُهُم|(to) one of them,|136|184|904$بِمَا|of what|71|119|43$ضَرَبَ|he sets up|90|114|13727$لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|for the Most Gracious|163|176|11157$مَثَلاً|(as) a likeness,|121|146|261$ظَلَّ|becomes|78|103|9999$وَجْهُهُۥ|his face|91|116|10000$مُسْوَدًّا|dark|82|107|10001$وَهُوَ|and he|65|78|305$كَظِيمٌ|(is) filled with grief.|149|149|9220$

4344.verse: وَجَعَلُواْ|And they made,|125|153|5896$ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ|the Angels,|95|151|3047$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|145|20$هُمْ|themselves|94|150|49$عِبَـٰدُ|(are) slaves|99|127|15469$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|(of) the Most Gracious,|175|188|3$إِنَـٰثًا‌ۚ|females.|75|101|4464$أَشَهِدُواْ|Did they witness|130|156|15470$خَلْقَهُمْ‌ۚ|their creation?|116|142|15471$سَتُكْتَبُ|Will be recorded|126|139|15472$شَهَـٰدَتُهُمْ|their testimony,|125|296|15473$وَيُسْــَٔلُونَ|and they will be questioned.|207|378|15474$

4345.verse: وَقَالُواْ|And they say,|113|121|760$لَوْ|`If|41|57|905$شَآءَ|had willed|85|101|2277$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ|the Most Gracious,|145|161|1415$مَا عَبَدْنَـٰهُم‌ۗ|we would not have worshipped them.`|276|284|15475$مَّا|Not|43|55|262$لَهُم|they have|87|111|98$بِذَٲلِكَ|about that|91|115|15476$مِنْ|any|50|74|53$عِلْمٍ‌ۖ|knowledge.|94|118|4620$إِنْ|Nothing|70|94|225$هُمْ|they (do)|83|107|49$إِلَّا|but|42|54|86$يَخْرُصُونَ|lie.|119|119|5974$

4346.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|62|62$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ|have We given them|156|204|1841$كِتَـٰبًا|a book|64|112|3338$مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ|before it,|107|155|3324$فَهُم|so they|70|118|152$بِهِۦ|to it|52|76|204$مُسْتَمْسِكُونَ|(are) holding fast?|142|142|15477$

4336.verse: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth -

4337.verse: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount.

4338.verse: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it.

4339.verse: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return."

4340.verse: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.

4341.verse: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?

4342.verse: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.

4343.verse: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah]?

4344.verse: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned.

4345.verse: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying.

4346.verse: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?

4347.verse: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."
